Header: Buenos Aires prepares to host Youth Olympic Games
Content: Argentina is preparing to host the the 2018 Youth Olympic Games, which will begin on Saturday (October 6) with an unprecedented opening ceremony to be held at Buenos Airesâ€™ central obelisk.President Mauricio Macri visited the Olympic village and spoke to the young athletes . The 2018 Olympic Youth Games will be held from October 6 to 18 in Buenos Aires.Some 4,000 15 to 18 year-old athletes from 206 countries will participate in 32 sports.
